name: WAF App - Audit Logs and Metrics

children.name: Alert - Delete Create Update Get Rule Audit
children.searchQuery:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* WAF AND (CreateRule or UpdateRule or DeleteRule or GetRule)
| parse "\"eventName\":\"*\"" as eventName nodrop
| where eventName in ("CreateRule", "UpdateRule", "DeleteRule", "GetRule")
| parse "\"accountId\":\"*\"" as accountId nodrop 
| parse "\"userName\":\"*\"" as userName nodrop 
| parse "\"principalId\":\"*\"" as userIdentity nodrop 
| parse "\"accessKeyId\":\"*\"" as accessKeyId nodrop 
| parse "\"eventTime\":\"*\"" as eventTime nodrop 
| count as count by eventTime, eventName, userName, accessKeyId, accountId, userIdentity 
| sort by eventTime, eventName, userName, accessKeyId, accountId, userIdentity

panels.name: CreateRule Events
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* (WAF AND CreateRule)
| json field=_raw "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "userIdentity.type" nodrop
| parse "\"accountId\":\"*\"" as accountId , "\"userName\":\"*\"" as userName, "\"principalId\":\"*\"" as userIdentity, "\"accessKeyId\":\"*\"" as accessKeyId, "\"eventTime\":\"*\"" as eventTime nodrop
| where eventsource matches "*waf*"
| where eventName = "CreateRule"
| count

panels.name: DeleteRule Events
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* (WAF AND DeleteRule)
| json field=_raw "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "userIdentity.type" nodrop
| parse "\"accountId\":\"*\"" as accountId , "\"userName\":\"*\"" as userName, "\"principalId\":\"*\"" as userIdentity, "\"accessKeyId\":\"*\"" as accessKeyId, "\"eventTime\":\"*\"" as eventTime nodrop
| where eventsource matches "*waf*"
| where eventName = "DeleteRule"
| count

panels.name: UpdateRule Events
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* (WAF AND UpdateRule)
| json field=_raw "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "userIdentity.type" nodrop
| parse "\"accountId\":\"*\"" as accountId , "\"userName\":\"*\"" as userName, "\"principalId\":\"*\"" as userIdentity, "\"accessKeyId\":\"*\"" as accessKeyId, "\"eventTime\":\"*\"" as eventTime nodrop
| where eventsource matches "*waf*"
| where eventName = "UpdateRule"
| count

panels.name: GetRule Events
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* (WAF AND GetRule)
| json field=_raw "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "userIdentity.type" nodrop
| parse "\"accountId\":\"*\"" as accountId , "\"userName\":\"*\"" as userName, "\"principalId\":\"*\"" as userIdentity, "\"accessKeyId\":\"*\"" as accessKeyId, "\"eventTime\":\"*\"" as eventTime nodrop
| where eventsource matches "*waf*"
| where eventName = "GetRule"
| count

panels.name: Count by EventName and UserName
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* WAF //AND (CreateRule or UpdateRule or DeleteRule or GetRule)
| json field=_raw "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "userIdentity.type" nodrop
| parse "\"accountId\":\"*\"" as accountId , "\"userName\":\"*\"" as userName, "\"principalId\":\"*\"" as userIdentity, "\"accessKeyId\":\"*\"" as accessKeyId, "\"eventTime\":\"*\"" as eventTime nodrop
//| where eventName in ("CreateRule", "UpdateRule", "DeleteRule", "GetRule")
| where eventsource matches "*waf*"
| count as count by eventName, userName
| sort count, eventName

panels.name: Audit Table - Event Trend
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* WAF //AND (CreateRule or UpdateRule or DeleteRule or GetRule)
| json field=_raw "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "userIdentity.type" nodrop
| parse "\"accountId\":\"*\"" as accountId , "\"userName\":\"*\"" as userName, "\"principalId\":\"*\"" as userIdentity, "\"accessKeyId\":\"*\"" as accessKeyId, "\"eventTime\":\"*\"" as eventTime nodrop
//| where eventName in ("CreateRule", "UpdateRule", "DeleteRule", "GetRule")
| where eventsource matches "*waf*"
| timeslice 1h
| count as count by eventName, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column eventName

panels.name: Audit Events - Geolocation
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* WAF
| json field=_raw "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "userIdentity.type" nodrop
| parse "\"accountId\":\"*\"" as accountId , "\"userName\":\"*\"" as userName, "\"principalId\":\"*\"" as userIdentity, "\"accessKeyId\":\"*\"" as accessKeyId, "\"eventTime\":\"*\"" as eventTime nodrop
| where eventsource matches "*waf*"
// Geo Lookup
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code from geo://default on ip = sourceipaddress
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code
| sort _count

metricsQueries.query: Namespace=WAF Rule=* metric=AllowedRequests Statistic=sum | sum by Rule
Namespace=WAF WebACL=* metric=BlockedRequests Statistic=sum | sum by WebACL
Namespace=WAF WebACL=* metric=CountedRequests Statistic=sum | sum by WebACL
Namespace=WAF Region=* metric=CountedRequests Statistic=sum | sum by Region
Namespace=WAF WebACL=* metric=AllowedRequests Statistic=sum | sum by WebACL
Namespace=WAF Region=* metric=BlockedRequests Statistic=sum | sum by Region
Namespace=WAF Region=* metric=AllowedRequests Statistic=sum | sum by Region
Namespace=WAF Rule=* metric=CountedRequests Statistic=sum | sum by Rule
Namespace=WAF Rule=* metric=BlockedRequests Statistic=sum | sum by Rule
Namespace=WAF metric=CountedRequests statistic=sum | quantize to 1h using sum | sum by Region
Namespace=WAF metric=CountedRequests statistic=sum | quantize to 1h using sum | sum by Region | timeshift 7d
Namespace=WAF metric=CountedRequests statistic=sum | quantize to 1h using sum | sum by Region | timeshift 14d

panels.name: Audit Table - Delete Create Update Get Rules
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* WAF AND (CreateRule or UpdateRule or DeleteRule or GetRule)
| json field=_raw "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "userIdentity.type" nodrop
| parse "\"accountId\":\"*\"" as accountId , "\"userName\":\"*\"" as userName, "\"principalId\":\"*\"" as userIdentity, "\"accessKeyId\":\"*\"" as accessKeyId, "\"eventTime\":\"*\"" as eventTime nodrop
| where eventsource matches "*waf*"
| where eventName in ("CreateRule", "UpdateRule", "DeleteRule", "GetRule")
| count as count by eventTime, eventName, userName, accessKeyId, accountId, userIdentity 
| sort by eventTime, eventName, userName, accessKeyId, accountId, userIdentity

panels.name: API Calls by Event Name
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*cloudtrail* WAF
| json field=_raw "eventSource", "eventName", "awsRegion", "sourceIPAddress", "userAgent", "userIdentity.type" nodrop
| parse "\"accountId\":\"*\"" as accountId , "\"userName\":\"*\"" as userName, "\"principalId\":\"*\"" as userIdentity, "\"accessKeyId\":\"*\"" as accessKeyId, "\"eventTime\":\"*\"" as eventTime nodrop
| where eventsource matches "*waf*"
| where eventSource = "waf.amazonaws.com"
| count by eventName

metricsQueries.query: Namespace=WAF metric=BlockedRequests statistic=sum | quantize to 1h using sum | sum
Namespace=WAF metric=BlockedRequests statistic=sum | quantize to 1h using sum | sum | timeshift 7d
Namespace=WAF metric=BlockedRequests statistic=sum | quantize to 1h using sum | sum | timeshift 14d

panels.name: 1 Week Delta (Today - Same Day Last Week)

metricsQueries.query: Namespace=WAF metric=CountedRequests statistic=sum | sum by Region
Namespace=WAF metric=CountedRequests statistic=sum | sum by Region | timeshift 7d
